thread.section_title: Munich Ski Shuttle Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Munich Ski Shuttle | www.munich-ski-shuttle.com | 2 von 10
thread.title: Siggi
thread.title_full: Munich Ski Shuttle bewertet von Siggi

author: Siggi
title: Siggi
text: A friend suggested Munich Ski Shuttle when I decided to go skiing in Austria and from the first contact the service was 100%. The pick-up was timely and the driver was helpful and perfect in every aspect. I totally recommend this service for people landing in Munich and going skiing south of the city.
